alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Passaic, northern Bergen, northern Westchester, southeastern Orange, Putnam and Rockland Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fahnestock State Park to near Bloomingdale. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Ossining, Ridgewood, Peekskill, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Ringwood, Haverstraw, Suffern, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Nyack, West Point and Tappan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
